We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private KaufmanEfficiencyRatio _ker;
// In Initialize()
_ker = KER(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_ker.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "KER Period", _ker.Period);
    Plot("My Indicators", "KER Current", _ker.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
self.ker = self.KER(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.ker.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "KER Period", self.ker.Period);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "KER Current", self.ker.Current);
